data.title: 以 1 到 3 分钟谈论以下主题
data.content: Describe the most important thing you do to stay healthy. Who taught you this behavior, and how have they modeled it for you? Why do you think it is important?
data.answer: Organized, well-structured youth sports and on-going physical activities can provide many benefits for people. The most important thing I do to stay healthy is to exercise on a regular basis. My father taught me this behaviour and helped tailor an exercise plan for me to stick with. Basically, I have to be physically active for 30 minutes most days of the week. I break this up into three 10-minute sessions when pressed for time. Healthy movement may include walking, jogging, stretching or other activities I enjoy and feel like to perform in different cases. Exercise is important because it can help me reach my fitness goals and maintain a healthy weight. However, it also encourages healthy decision-making such as not smoking and not drinking. Sports also have hidden health benefits such as lowering the chance of a number of diseases. (140字)
